pages.text: $(8)The thirst system works almost the same as the hunger system. $(br2)Thirst can be filled using the drink keybind ('B' by default) when being close enough to water and looking at it. $(br2)If you thirst reaches zero, you will dehydrate and receive damage until you die or until you fill up your thirst.
pages.title: Thirst System

pages.text: $(8)Thirst can have a total of 20 points (same as vanilla hunger system)
